definition: to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale

pinyin: shang4 hu1 xi1 dao4 gan3 ran3
er4 ji2 tou2 hu1 xi1 qi4
bei4 yong4 er4 ji2 tou2 hu1 xi1 qi4

definition: ventilator (artificial breathing apparatus used in hospitals)

pinyin: yan2 zhong4 ji2 xing4 hu1 xi1 xi4 tong3 zong1 he2 zheng4
containing_words.word: 嚴重急性呼吸系統綜合症

pinyin: mi4 bi4 shi4 xun2 huan2 zai4 hu1 xi1 shui3 fei4 xi4 tong3
containing_words.word: 密閉式循環再呼吸水肺系統

pinyin: shui4 mian2 hu1 xi1 zan4 ting2

sentences.english: It starts with that deep breath of confidence you take before the first step.
sentences.chinese: 千里之行，開始於邁出第一步前那口自信的深呼吸。

sentences.english: The influence of electromagnetic wave on biologic respiratory process is demonstrated by an experiment.
sentences.chinese: 本文用實驗證實了電磁波對生物呼吸過程的影響。

sentences.english: We stood there listening to our own breathing.
sentences.chinese: 我們站在那裏聆聽着我們自己的呼吸聲。

sentences.english: DNP treatment reduced the alternative respiration pathway capacity.
sentences.chinese: 而DNP處理則降低交替呼吸途徑容量。

sentences.english: The pranas are always moving, and the mind is ever-changing as well.
sentences.chinese: 呼吸總是運動的，思想也總是千變萬化。

sentences.english: The “others” were asleep, while they both breathed the same fever.
sentences.chinese: “他人”都睡熟了，只有他們兩個呼吸着同一種熱度。

sentences.english: Love will make your life easier to pass, until one day you can breath no more.
sentences.chinese: 愛將使您的生活通過，直到一天您沒能呼吸。

sentences.english: How can developers and landscape architects work with architects, engineers to bring enough part of the greening into our buildings?
sentences.chinese: 建築和景觀的共融形成了會呼吸的建築物的概念。

sentences.english: These patients are told to blink their eyes and to respire through their noses.
sentences.chinese: 八位患者並告之以眨眼動作，並由鼻孔呼吸。

sentences.english: I heard Heidi breathe deeply, but she said nothing.
sentences.chinese: 我聽見了海蒂清晰的呼吸聲，但她什麼也沒有說。

sentences.english: I held my breath, not knowing what to expect.
sentences.chinese: 我屏住呼吸，不明白接下來會發生什麼。

sentences.english: The poison is in her blood and on her breath.
sentences.chinese: 現在她的血液和呼吸中毒有劇毒。

sentences.english: Try breathing easily and gently tell yourself to relax.
sentences.chinese: 讓呼吸平靜下來，輕輕告戒自己放鬆心情。

sentences.english: I also do the deep breathing and self-massage mentioned above as I do so.
sentences.chinese: 在閒步中也做上文提到的深呼吸和自我推拿運動。

definition: to exhale/to blow off steam/(phonetics) aspirated
to take a breath (in swimming)/to ventilate
to breathe in/to suck in/to inhale
